RFE: 

Please add the Page's Title when using "Firefox Button" (no Menu visible).

STR:

1. To show the "Firefox Button" choose [View][Toolbars] and uncheck [Menu Bar].
2. Now the "Firefox Button" is shown (and you get an extra line of Screen real estate but the "<title>Page's Title</title>" is no longer displayed.

Please add the Page's Title back onto the Chrome (even when using the "Firefox Button").

See attached images.
1. Old Menu Bar.
2. New "Firefox Button".
3. Newest "Firefox Button" WITH the Page's Title displayed.
